modules.name: Content Relevance
modules.description: Analyzes how well your content matches AI model training patterns
insights: Strong topical coverage across 12 core themes
Content depth exceeds AI model expectations
Missing coverage in 3 emerging topic clusters

issues.message: Thin content detected on 8 product pages

recommendations: Expand product pages to minimum 800 words with use cases
Update statistics dated before 2024
Add FAQ sections to cover long-tail queries

modules.name: Entity Recognition
modules.description: Measures how clearly AI models can identify and understand your brand
insights: Brand entity successfully recognized across 94% of contexts

issues.message: Ambiguous brand mentions on partner sites

recommendations: Implement structured data markup on all pages
Ensure consistent brand naming across external mentions
Create a brand knowledge graph document

modules.name: E-E-A-T Signals
modules.description: Evaluates Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness
insights: Author credentials present on 85% of content
Strong backlink profile from authoritative domains
Clear expertise demonstrated in technical content

issues.message: Missing author bios on 12 key articles
issues.impact: Reduces trust signals for AI models

recommendations: Add comprehensive author bios with credentials
Implement published and updated dates site-wide
Include case studies and original research
Add customer testimonials with verifiable details

modules.name: Citation Worthiness
modules.description: Assesses likelihood of being cited by AI models in responses
insights: High citation rate for statistical content

issues.message: Only 3 pieces of original research published

issues.impact: Missing out on comparison query citations

recommendations: Publish monthly industry reports with original data
Create comprehensive comparison guides
Add infographics and data visualizations
Develop a resource library with downloadable assets

modules.name: Semantic Clarity
modules.description: Evaluates how clearly your content communicates meaning to AI models
insights: Clear topic modeling across content hierarchy
Strong use of semantic HTML structure

issues.impact: May reduce comprehension for general queries

recommendations: Add glossary definitions for technical terms
Audit and fix heading hierarchy issues
Use schema.org markup for key concepts

modules.name: Freshness Signals
modules.description: Measures content recency and update frequency

issues.impact: Signals stale information to AI models

issues.message: No content published on 3 trending topics

recommendations: Establish quarterly content refresh schedule
Create content calendar for trending topics
Add 'Last Updated' timestamps prominently
Archive or redirect severely outdated content

modules.name: Cross-Platform Presence
modules.description: Analyzes brand visibility across multiple data sources AI models use

issues.message: No presence on 4 major review platforms
Inconsistent NAP (Name, Address, Phone) across directories

recommendations: Claim and optimize profiles on review platforms
Standardize NAP information across all listings
Create video content for YouTube and social platforms
Participate in industry podcasts and webinars
